Package org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.document

Class DocumentValue

java.lang.Object
org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.document.DocumentValue
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DocumentValue extends Object implements Serializable
Class that holds a content + mime type and a name OR the url if it's an external document. It is used by DOCUMENT_CREATE_UPDATE operations to create or update a document stored in bonita
Author:
Baptiste Mesta
See Also:

    Represent an existing document that changed with the content and metadata in parameters.
    DocumentValue(long documentId, String url)
    Represent an existing document that changed to an external document.
    DocumentValue(String url)
    Represent the value of an external document, only the url is given

  • Constructor Details

    • DocumentValue

      public DocumentValue(byte[] content, String mimeType, String fileName)
      Represent the value of a document. Content, mime type and file name are given
      Parameters:
      content - content of the document
      mimeType - mime type of the document
      fileName - file name of the document
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the content or the fileName is null or empty

    • DocumentValue

      public DocumentValue(String url)
      Represent the value of an external document, only the url is given
      Parameters:
      url - url of the document

    • DocumentValue

      public DocumentValue(long documentId)
      Represent an existing document that did not changed. It is used only in operations to update document list.
      Parameters:
      documentId - the id of the existing document (mapping)

    • DocumentValue

      public DocumentValue(long documentId, byte[] content, String mimeType, String fileName)
      Represent an existing document that changed with the content and metadata in parameters. It is used only in operations to update document list.
      Parameters:
      documentId - the id of the existing document (mapping)
      content - content of the document
      mimeType - mime type of the document
      fileName - file name of the document
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the content or the fileName is null or empty

    • DocumentValue

      public DocumentValue(long documentId, String url)
      Represent an existing document that changed to an external document. It is used only in operations to update document list.
      Parameters:
      documentId - the id of the existing document (mapping)

    • hasChanged

      public boolean hasChanged()
      If the document value updates an existing document, this getter tels us if the content is modified and should be updated
      Returns:
      true if the content of the original document has changed
